sources.title: Lady Luck (1936) DRAMA
sources.description:
Stars: Patricia Farr, William Bakewell, Lulu McConnell 
 Director: Charles Lamont

 A manicurist is mistaken for the winner of a large sweepstakes and finds herself pursued by fortune hunters. But the real trouble begins when the real winner shows up!

metadata.Plot: (1936, Chesterfield) - William Bakewell, Patricia Farr, Lulu McConnell, Duncan Renaldo, Iris Adrian. A female movie-star wannabe holds a winning ticket for a race won by champion racehorse, Lady Luck. Things get complicated for her when a slimy sportsman is found shot to death, the murder weapon in the hand of the starlet. A sharp reporter tries to figure out who the real killer is. A great little Chesterfield whodunit. 16mm.
metadata.Writer: John W. Krafft, Dorrell McGowan, Stuart E. McGowan
metadata.Actors: Patricia Farr, William Bakewell, Duncan Renaldo
